attributes.action: MAKE SOCIAL CARE WRITE THE TRUTH IN REPORTS IF WE HAVE SECOND EU VOTE IN THE UK
attributes.additional_details: There are many - too many tragic cases like Liam Fee, little A smith and Baby P - and many more that were handed back to disgusting parents and this makes headlines - but there are thousands that are stolen that dont deserve to be from birth, hours old that shouldnt be too - the child might live, but the parents dont inside - this is murder of parents and families in the UK and the world - mainly for money not for love or care - the real families care but they are silenced by the system in the UK
attributes.background: Many families in the UK are failed by Social Care the majority have lies told about them  to make reports look better if they make a mistakes - its your fault, if you make a mistake its your fault and if nobody makes any mistakes its your fault so if we have second EU vote all parents second chance

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
